Summary: Only Meant To Be Used In Asian Dishes
text:
Please don't purchase these noodles thinking you are going to smother them in Marinara or Alfredo sauce. They are meant for Asian stir fry and soup dishes.

Also they smell terrible when you open the bag and you either have to run them under hot water or boil them first to get rid of the smell.

Once they are washed they offer a neutral flaovr and can be added to any stir fry as a replacement for rice noodles.

I would not purchase these again as I think the flavor is not good and you don't get enough for what you are paying for. The packs are ridiculously small.
